extendedInfo.description: The World Geography Challenge V1.5 game improves and tests your knowledge of countries worldwide. Like a puzzle, you are asked to drag and drop the country names into the correct locations. The game also includes a Learning Mode that indicates country names as you hover over them. And the Challenge Mode allows you to compete against yourself and also with gamers worldwide.Good luck!

reviews.title: Fun & Great Way to Learn
reviews.comment: Really like the game, it was exactly what I was looking for. Some minor bugs keep it from being a 5/5. Most common bug I\'ve seen is it can be very difficult to select the small countries. Often resulting in the game not registering the pick.
reviews.author: J Calcote

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: The scroll bar with the country names is aggravating. I try to select and it doesn\'t, or it lets go right away.
reviews.author: Amber Rettler

reviews.title: Bad controls
reviews.comment: The controls are so aggravating
reviews.author: Anna Menefee

reviews.title: Despite some bugs an overall fun way to learn country locations
reviews.comment: Fun to place countries
reviews.author: Pamela Campbell

reviews.title: Fun! Great way to learn countries!
reviews.comment: Really fun! Please fix East Timor/Laos and make it easier to click on the tiny countries.
reviews.author: kelly king

reviews.title: World geography challenge
reviews.comment: Works well enough to teach you the country names. Addictive learning tool. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: East Timor and Laos are swapped...
reviews.comment: Overall, a simple, useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive,some hitches
reviews.comment: Very addictive game, almost perfect. But sometimes doesn\'t accept the really small countries as correct answers when I know its the right one. Plus it does the whole \"congrats you\'ve completed it\" thing when I have 3 or 4 countries left to place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but improvements needed
reviews.comment: Good way to learn....great interactivity:) A couple of changes needed though-Laos and East Timor are the wrong way round, plus hard to select small countries...zoom function required to fix this.
reviews.author: Kieran Duke

reviews.title: Fun concept, but with weaknesses
reviews.comment: Dragging country names to map location is fun but smaller countries require very steady fingers & difficult to select. Must frequently slide map around when on small screen, so timer measures finger speed over geographic knowledge
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awkward and frustrating
reviews.comment: Interface is sticky and unreliable. Often fails to acknowledge correct placement of countries, and then counts them as wrong answers. Cape Verde, for example, simply would not register.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: World geography challenge
reviews.comment: Good maps but appears to not work on my Google nexus, countries highlight in completely random areas rather than over the countries clicked on, and you can\'t just ignore it as big chunks not visible. Shame, looks like fun
reviews.author: charlotte enderby

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: East Timor & Laos are incorrectly switched! Otherwise, it\'s an effective app, it lets you keep trying til you get the right spot so you learn better. Placing small countries can be tricky & moving the map a bit buggy & tiresome, but not a huge deal.
reviews.author: Janette R

reviews.title: Ashamed
reviews.comment: As a proud Fairleigh Dickinson student I am embarrassed and ashamed that such a low caliber product is being associated with my university.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but badly needs an update
reviews.comment: Suffers from a few serious flaws including switching Laos and east timor and ending the Africa game before all states are filled in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to pick small countries
reviews.comment: Great concept but as others mentioned, Laos and East Timor are reversed. Very difficult to label small countries without getting them wrong. Good idea for app though.
reviews.author: Greg Rodgers

reviews.title: Almost good
reviews.comment: Would be a great app if all of the countries were properly labeled. I don\'t want to learn inaccurate information. Fix please!!
reviews.author: Shelley Ogden

reviews.title: Great idea but a few bugs
reviews.comment: Great way to learn world geography.  East Timor/Laos are round the wrong way tho. Its very hard to select small countries and it often doesnt save your selections and you have to re-do. Fix the bugs and def 5 stars
reviews.author: Kaiko McKay

reviews.title: Small request - Allow moving to SD card
reviews.comment: Modify the app to move and run from SD card. I like your app. Increase the button size also.
reviews.author: Anish Prabu T

reviews.title: Horrible!!!
reviews.comment: East Timor and Laos and Cape Verde and Luxembourg don\'t click!!! And when you do a country most of the time it doesnt click either!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
